location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government of Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting a letter sent on 18 February 1814, from J Adam, Secretary to the Government at Fort William, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay, informing that two bills, for a total of 20,000 Rupees, were paid by the Government for the account of the pension of Mohummed Nubbe Khaun [Muhammad Nabi Khan].
